description: This Dart source file defines a StorageService class that manages local SQLite database operations for an event planner application. It includes methods for initializing the database schema, managing CRUD operations for events, birthdays, messages, and notifications, and handles database connection lifecycle.

classes.name: StorageService
classes.description: Singleton class providing an interface to local SQLite storage, managing data related to events, birthdays, messages, and notifications.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Lazy async getter that returns the database instance, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _initDb
methods.description: Private method that initializes the database, creating tables for events, birthdays, messages, and notifications.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Retrieves all events ordered by start date.

methods.name: insertEvent
methods.description: Inserts a new event record into the database.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Updates an existing event identified by its ID.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Deletes an event by its ID.

methods.name: deleteBirthday
methods.description: Deletes a birthday record by ID.

methods.name: getMessages
methods.description: Retrieves messages in a conversation between two users.

methods.name: updateMessageStatus
methods.description: Updates the delivery/read status of a message.

methods.name: trackNotification
methods.description: Stores information about a scheduled notification in the database.

methods.name: getUpcomingNotifications
methods.description: Retrieves notifications scheduled for future times.
